translation.en: I'm calm, steady.
translation.zh: 我很冷静 情绪稳定

translation.en: I slept well. 8.2 hours. No bad dreams.
translation.zh: 我睡得饱 8.2小时没有噩梦

translation.en: I am ready to go.
Ready to do my job to the best of my abilities.
translation.zh: 预备尽我所能去完成我的工作

translation.en: I am focused only on the essential, to the exclusion of all else.
translation.zh: 我只专注于重要的 心无旁骛

translation.en: I will make only pragmatic decisions.
translation.zh: 我只会做出务实的决定

translation.en: I will not allow myself to be distracted.
I will not allow my mind to linger on that which is unimportant.
translation.zh: 我不会让我的思绪纠缠在不重要的事上

translation.en: I will not rely on anyone or anything.
translation.zh: 我不会依赖任何人或任何东西

translation.en: I will not be vulnerable to mistakes.
Resting BPM, 47. Submit.
[automated voice] Your psychological evaluation has been approved.
translation.zh: 您的心理评估已获批准

translation.en: As a reminder,
translation.zh: 作为提醒 请进行安全和设备检查…

translation.en: please perform any safety and equipment checks...
translation.zh: 作为提醒 请进行安全和设备检查… 成为宇航员一直是我的愿望…

translation.en: [Roy] I always wanted to become an astronaut...
translation.zh: 成为宇航员一直是我的愿望…

translation.en: for the future of mankind and all.
translation.zh: 为了人类及一切的未来

translation.en: At least, that's what I always told myself.
translation.zh: 至少 我一直是这样告诉自己的

translation.en: I see myself from the outside.
Smile, present a side.
It's a performance...
with my eye on the exit.
Always on the exit.
Just don't touch me.
[man 1 on radio] Take care, Major. Be careful.
translation.zh: 小心 少校 当心点

translation.en: [Roy] Thanks for that.
[man 2 on radio] Roy, Bravo post has got a robotic arm on 93 Echo...
translation.zh: 罗伊 布拉沃柱在93回声有个机械臂

translation.en: appears to be malfunctioning.
We're gonna need you to take a team down there and check it out.
translation.zh: 我们要你派一个团队下去进行检查

translation.en: Run some diagnostics. Over.
translation.zh: 运行一些诊断 完毕

translation.en: [Roy] Copy that. Heading that way.
[Doug on radio] Good morning to our astronauts up there on the International Space Antenna.
translation.zh: 我们在国际太空天线的宇航员早安

translation.en: Sure is a beautiful day.
Just perfect to try and contact...
our distant neighbors out there in the heavens.
translation.zh: 我们在天堂的远方邻居

translation.en: [Roy] At least it's comfortable out here.
[Doug] I got some scores here.
Let's see, it was Iowa State over Kansas, 35 - 16.
translation.zh: 我看看堪萨斯胜爱荷华 35-16

translation.en: [Roy] Space I understand.
Control, I have visual on the arm. Over.
translation.zh: 控制中心 我看到手臂完毕

translation.en: [Officer 1] Affirmative, Major. Proceed.
[Roy] Copy that. Moving to the unit now.
Control, I'm seeing a power surge on C-post. You getting that?
translation.zh: 控制中心 我看到C柱电涌你是否看到？

translation.en: [Officer 2] Uh... Roger that, Roy...
translation.zh: 收到 罗伊… 控制中心 这里有很多人 完毕

translation.en: [Roy] Control, we got a lot of people up there. Over.
translation.zh: 控制中心 这里有很多人 完毕 控制中心 看来出现了更强的…

translation.en: [astronaut] Control. Control, I think we have some spikes...
translation.zh: 控制中心 看来出现了更强的…

translation.en: [Officer 2] Please just stand by, we're working the issue.
translation.zh: 请等等 我们正在修理

translation.en: Just stand by. [astronaut] Control, they're happening everywhere.
translation.zh: -请等等-控制中心 到处都发生了

translation.en: [Roy] Command, cutting power.
[Officer 2] Get off the tower now!
You've gotta bail out!
[astronaut] Oh, my God!
[Roy] Control, McBride.
translation.zh: 控制中心 我是麦克布莱德

translation.en: I'm in a spin. Atmosphere's too thin to stabilize.
translation.zh: 我在旋转 大气层太薄 无法稳定

translation.en: I'm trying to keep the tumble down, so I don't black out.
translation.zh: 我试图减慢速度 以防昏厥

translation.en: Control, do you read?
[Roy] "A self-destructive side."
That's what she used to say to me.
I should feel something.
I survived. I should feel something.
translation.zh: 我活下来了 我应该感觉些什么

translation.en: [reporter] In what has become known as "The Surge"...
a series of destructive electrical storms has wreaked havoc across the globe...
translation.zh: 一系列破坏性电风暴在全球造成了严重破坏

translation.en: and scientists are concerned we've not seen the last of them yet.
translation.zh: 科学家们担心这只是开始

translation.en: Their origin? Outer space.
-The cause? Unknown so far... -[beeps]
[Commander] This is a message from SPACECOM.
translation.zh: 这是来自太空司令部的消息

translation.en: In light of the recent catastrophe...
your attendance is required for a debrief...
translation.zh: 我们需要你出席汇报会

translation.en: to be held in Building 91, Vandersteen Base.
translation.zh: 在万德斯蒂基地91大厦举行

translation.en: Please note, this meeting will be classified "top secret."
translation.zh: 请注意 本次会议将被列为“绝密”

translation.en: Roy, how are you? Thanks for coming in. Appreciate it.
translation.zh: 罗伊 你好吗？谢谢你的到来

translation.en: [Roy] General. This is Lieutenant General Rivas, Director of
-U.S. SPACECOM Special Ops. -Hi.
translation.zh: -美国太空司令部特别行动主任-嗨

translation.en: -Sir. -[Rivas] Major.
[Stroud] Adjutant General Vogel, head of Security.
translation.zh: 保安部首长 沃格尔将军

translation.en: -Major. -Ma'am.
[Stroud] They flew all the way in from Virginia just last night, just to see you.
translation.zh: 他们昨晚从弗吉尼亚飞过来就是为了见你

translation.en: Well, thank you.
Your, uh, profile is certainly very impressive.
translation.zh: 你的个人资料令人印象深刻

translation.en: You've done exceptionally well on all the assessment tests.
translation.zh: 你在所有评估测试中表现都非常出色

translation.en: Basic combat, space training. Just exceptional across the board.
translation.zh: 基本作战 太空训练各方面都很优秀

translation.en: The rumor is that your pulse rate has never gone above 80...
translation.zh: 有传言说你的脉率从未高过80

translation.en: in any of the spacewalks, skywalks, and even on this most recent fall.
translation.zh: 在任何太空行走 空中行走甚至是最近的坠落事件

translation.en: Is that correct?
Well, so far, sir.
translation.zh: 目前来说 是的 长官

translation.en: [Stroud] That's very impressive.
According to this, married once, no children?
translation.zh: 根据记录 结了一次婚 没有孩子？

translation.en: Yes, sir.
It's dangerous business, as we know. Best not to subject others to it.
translation.zh: 众所周知 这是危险的行业所以最好别牵涉其他人

translation.en: Fair enough.
Well, we didn't bring you in here to talk about your fall, Roy.
translation.zh: 我们带你来这里不是来谈你的下坠的事 罗伊

translation.en: We have something...
of a highly classified nature to show you.
Please have a seat, Major.
Yes, ma'am.
[Rivas] What you are about to see are spectrogram images of Neptune.
translation.zh: 你将看到的是海王星的光谱图像

translation.en: These are cosmic ray bursts.
That was taken just 11 days ago.
It released high-energy particles...
that caused a catastrophic power surge all over the world.
translation.zh: 导致全球灾难性的电涌

translation.en: And that's what almost killed you.
translation.zh: 那就是差点杀了你的东西

translation.en: The rays grow stronger as they radiate towards us here on Earth.
translation.zh: 那些射线对地球的辐射越来越强

translation.en: Major, what can you tell us about the Lima Project?
translation.zh: 少校 你对利玛计划有什么看法？

translation.en: First manned expedition to the outer solar system, sir.
translation.zh: 长官 它是首个载人到外太阳系的探险

translation.en: Some 29 years ago, as you know.
translation.zh: 就在大约29年前 你也知道

translation.en: [Rivas] And the commander was...
He was my father, sir.
The ship disappeared approximately 16 years into the mission.
translation.zh: 宇宙飞船执行任务大约16年后消失

translation.en: No data was ever recovered. Deep space missions were halted after that.
translation.zh: 没有数据被回收 这之后外太空任务终止

translation.en: Yes, that's him.
Can you tell us how you handled your father's absence?
translation.zh: 能不能告诉我们你如何应付爸爸的缺席？

translation.en: Well...
My mother was certainly distressed by it. Uh, she was quite ill at the time.
translation.zh: 我妈妈肯定受到很大的打击那时候她病得不轻

translation.en: But he was, uh, committed to his job...
and I'm sure it was very difficult for him as well.
translation.zh: 我相信对他而言也不容易

translation.en: [Stroud] Roy...
we have something that might come as quite a shock to you.
translation.zh: 我们有一些东西可能会让你震惊

translation.en: We believe your father is still alive near Neptune.
translation.zh: 我们相信令尊还活着 在海王星附近

translation.en: Where exactly, we do not know.
translation.zh: 确切地点 我们不知道

translation.en: Now, we've sent out numerous drones, but obviously, it's a vast area to cover.
translation.zh: 我们派出无数的无人机但显然 那是一个广阔的领域

translation.en: My father's alive, sir?
translation.zh: 我父亲还活着 长官？

translation.en: We believe so.
[Stroud] Roy, The Surge seems to be the result of some kind of anti-matter reaction.
translation.zh: 罗伊 那些电涌看来是源自某种反物质反应

translation.en: Now, the Lima Project was powered by that material...
translation.zh: 利玛计划由那种材料驱动

translation.en: and your father was in charge of it.
Now, we're talking about a potentially unstoppable chain reaction here.
translation.zh: 我们说的是可能无法阻挡的连锁反应

translation.en: The uncontrolled release of anti-matter...
translation.zh: 不受控制的反物质释放

translation.en: could ultimately threaten the stability of our entire solar system.
translation.zh: 最终会威胁整个太阳系的稳定

translation.en: All life could be destroyed.
Major, we would like you to send a personal message on Mars by secure laser...
translation.zh: 少校 我们希望你可在火星上通过安全激光 寄出一条私人信息

translation.en: to what we hope is the Lima Project.
translation.zh: 给我们希望是利玛计划的接收者

translation.en: The text of your message would be prepared in advance, of course.
translation.zh: 你的信息内容 当然 会在事先预备

translation.en: Mars, sir? I'm going to Mars?
translation.zh: 火星 长官？我要去火星？

translation.en: It is the last secure hub we have.
translation.zh: 它是我们拥有的最后一个安全中心

translation.en: [Stroud] Roy, we need to find out just what we're up against here.
translation.zh: 罗伊 我们必须找出事情的真相

translation.en: Our underground Mars base was the only one unaffected by The Surge.
translation.zh: 我们的火星地下基地是唯一不受电涌影响的地方

translation.en: And we believe a personal plea, from you to your father, might elicit a response.
translation.zh: 我们相信你给令尊发一个私人请求可能会得到回应

translation.en: We can track that signal...
translation.zh: 我们可以追踪那个信号

translation.en: locate him and figure out a way to stop this.
translation.zh: 找到他并想办法阻止这一切

translation.en: What is happening out there is a crisis of unknown magnitude.
translation.zh: 外面发生的事是一场严重程度未知的危机

translation.en: Now, we're counting on you to help us find him.
translation.zh: 我们希望你可以帮助我们找到他

translation.en: Are you with us?
-Yes, I am, sir. -[Stroud] Good.
You deploy first to the moon.
Our long-range rockets are stationed there on the Far Side.
translation.zh: 我们的远程火箭就驻扎在远方

translation.en: Everything after that will be on a need-to-know basis.
translation.zh: 之后的一切都是高级机密

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Given the magnitude of the threat...
a cover story is being formulated to avoid all panic.
translation.zh: 我们正制定一个故事以避免恐慌

translation.en: You'll be traveling commercially to the moon to keep a low profile.
translation.zh: 你将以游客身份登上月球来保持低调

translation.en: Colonel Pruitt will be your point person from here on.
translation.zh: 从现在开始普鲁特上校将是你的协调人

translation.en: Absolute top secrecy must be maintained.
translation.zh: 你必须绝对保持最高程度的保密

translation.en: [Roy] "Are you with us?"
Like I have a choice.
My dad was a pioneer.
He sacrificed himself for the search for intelligent life.
translation.zh: 他为寻求高智能生物而牺牲自己

translation.en: My dad was the program.
I was 16 when he left, 29 when he disappeared.
translation.zh: （H克利福德麦克布莱德） 他离开时我16岁他失踪时我29岁

translation.en: [automated voice] Archived message, received 27 years...
-3 months, 2 days ago. -[Roy] And that's that.
translation.zh: -三个月 两天前接收-就这样

translation.en: [Clifford] Roy, this is a message from your father.
translation.zh: 罗伊 这是来自令尊的信息

translation.en: I'm coming at you from the Lima Project.
translation.zh: 我在利玛计划上联络你

translation.en: Just on our way past Jupiter and ultimately on to Neptune.
translation.zh: 我们刚经过木星 最后进入海王星

translation.en: I know you have seen that we have excited real and enormous interest...
translation.zh: 我知道你见过了世上的人非常兴奋及很有兴趣

translation.en: around the world, and we are grateful for it.
We're doing big things up here, real big.
translation.zh: 我们在这里做着大事 很重要的事

translation.en: Namely, we're about to answer the number one question...
translation.zh: 就是说 我们将回答最重要的问题

translation.en: when do we find all the intelligent life out there?
translation.zh: 我们什么时候会找到高智能生物？

translation.en: And we know we will.
We're going to the edge of the heliosphere...
translation.zh: 我们要到日光层的边缘

translation.en: where the sun's magnetic field won't affect our instruments one bit.
translation.zh: 在那里 太阳的磁场一点也不会影响我们的仪器

translation.en: We'll be able to examine any star system for complex life.
translation.zh: 我们将能够检查任何拥有高智能生命的星系

translation.en: Never been done before, and we sure are optimistic.
translation.zh: 虽然前无古人 但我们非常乐观

translation.en: I feel your energy back home, and of course, I think of God.
translation.zh: 我感觉到在地球上的你的力量当然 我想到神

translation.en: I'm overwhelmed at seeing and feeling His presence...
translation.zh: 我看到并感受到他的存在 非常激动

translation.en: so close.
I love you, my son.
[man] Hello, Roy.
I'm here to go on this trip with you.
Keep my eye on ya.
Colonel Pruitt, good to meet you.
translation.zh: 普鲁特上校 很高兴认识你

translation.en: Actually...
we've met.
It was a long time ago. I knew your dad.
We were close, he and I.
We started out together, went to Purdue together.
translation.zh: 我们一起当宇航员 一起到普都

translation.en: He was a brilliant man.
-I know. -Yeah.
And I remember going to the house and seeing you.
translation.zh: 我记得去他家 见到你

translation.en: You were running around everywhere.
You drove your poor mother nuts, but...
translation.zh: 就快气死你妈妈 但是…

translation.en: How do you feel?
Is this part of my psych eval?
translation.zh: 这是心理评估的一部分？

translation.en: No, not really, but yes.
translation.zh: 不 不是的 但 也算是

translation.en: I mean, you're going to be monitored constantly...
your mental state, your emotional state.
You have a direct connection with the subject.
Colonel, for what it's worth, I think my father's dead.
translation.zh: 上校 我个人认为我父亲已死了

translation.en: Yeah, um...
I was a lunar astronaut for SPACECOM for 31 years.
translation.zh: 我身为太空司令部的月球宇航员已31年

translation.en: And I came to the realization out there...
a voyage of exploration can be used for something as simple as escape.
translation.zh: 一个探索之旅可用于像逃避这样简单的事

translation.en: I'm telling you this, Roy, because we have to hold out the possibility...
translation.zh: 我这样说 罗伊是因为我们必须保留这种可能性

translation.en: that your father may be hiding from us.
translation.zh: 那就是令尊可能在躲避我们

translation.en: Do you think you're ready to go?
translation.zh: 你觉得你准备好启程了吗？

translation.en: I'm ready.
All right.
[automated voice on speakers] Your pre-launch quarantine is almost complete.
translation.zh: 你发射前隔离接近完成

translation.en: You have shown no evidence
translation.zh: 未在你身上检测到细菌或病毒感染

translation.en: of bacterial or viral infection...
translation.zh: 未在你身上检测到细菌或病毒感染 我这辈子 搞砸了很多次

translation.en: [Roy] So many times in my life, I've screwed up.
translation.zh: 我这辈子 搞砸了很多次

translation.en: [automated voice] Although all efforts have been made...
translation.zh: 尽管已作出一切努力 应该聆听时 我却在说话

translation.en: [Roy] I've talked, when I should have listened.
translation.zh: 应该聆听时 我却在说话

translation.en: I've been harsh, when I should have been tender.
translation.zh: 应该温柔时 我却很苛刻

translation.en: [automated voice] In the event of illness or accident...
please make certain that you have listed any family members...
translation.zh: 请确保你已列出任何家庭成员

translation.en: spouse, or significant other as your next of kin, in your personal file.
translation.zh: 配偶 或伴侣 在你的个人档案中作为你的至亲

translation.en: Volume down.
Message. Personal directory. Eve.
translation.zh: 信息 个人通讯录 伊芙

translation.en: Hi, Eve, it's Roy.
translation.zh: 嗨 伊芙 是罗伊

translation.en: I'm away again, no surprise there.
translation.zh: 我再次出走了 没惊喜

translation.en: I just wanted to say...
I made a promise to always be truthful.
But I wasn't.
Listen, I wanted to say...
I didn't want you to go.
Delete.
Cancel.
[automated voice on speakers] Good morning.
[Roy] I've been trained to compartmentalize.
translation.zh: 我受过可划分区域的训练

translation.en: SPACECOM requires you to complete a pre-launch psychological evaluation.
translation.zh: 太空司令部要求你完成一次发射前的心理评估

translation.en: [Roy] It seems to me that's how I approach my life.
translation.zh: 看来 这就是我的生活方式

translation.en: Resting BPM is 56.
Didn't sleep much last night, but it shouldn't be a problem.
translation.zh: 昨晚没怎么睡 但应该没问题

translation.en: I remain mission ready.
[automated voice] You have been approved for lunar travel.
translation.zh: 你已被批准进行月球旅行

translation.en: [woman] Is it your first time to the moon?
translation.zh: 这是您第一次上月球吗？

translation.en: [Roy] No, but it's been a while.
translation.zh: 不 但已经很久没去了

translation.en: [woman] Are you planning on traveling outside the secure zone on your visit?
translation.zh: 你是否打算到访安全区外的地方？

translation.en: [Roy] No.
[woman] Again.
-How's that? -[Roy] Okay.
-[woman] Okay, not too snug? -Yeah, it feels all right.
[woman] Breathe.
[announcer on PA] Virgin flight 6092, to Tycho Base, Moon, boarding now.
translation.zh: 维珍航班6092 到第谷基地月球 现在登机

translation.en: Welcome aboard, sir. -I'm Captain Lu. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -欢迎登机 长官 我是陆船长-谢谢

translation.en: -Hi, Captain. -Watch the step.
-Duck your head. -Okay.
translation.zh: -你好 船长-小心低头 好

translation.en: -Hello, welcome. Flight pack? -Hello.
translation.zh: -你好 欢迎 飞行包？-你好

translation.en: -Yes, thanks. -Great.
translation.zh: -好的 谢谢-很好 第三个座位 右边

translation.en: -Third seat, to your right. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好的 谢谢-很好 第三个座位 右边 好

translation.en: Excuse me.
-Hello. -Hello.
[Captain Lu on PA] We remind you, the moon is borderless.
translation.zh: 我们提醒您 月球是无边界的

translation.en: Many mining zones are disputed territory and considered to be in a state of war.
translation.zh: 许多采矿区都是有争议的领土并处于战争状态

translation.en: Please stay within the restricted, safe area...
translation.zh: 请留在受限制安全区域内…

translation.en: Excuse me?
May I have a blanket and pillow pack please?
[flight attendant] Sure. $125.
[automated voice] Payment accepted.
-Thank you. -Thank you.
[Captain Lu] As we approach, some of you can see the grand telescope array...
translation.zh: 我们接近月球时你们一些人可看到盛大的望远镜阵列

translation.en: near the Atlas crater.
translation.zh: 就在阿特拉斯火山口附近

translation.en: It's the moon's largest facility for extraterrestrial research.
translation.zh: 这是月球最大的设施 用于外星研究

translation.en: [flight attendant] Hot towel?
-Oh, thank you. -Thank you for flying with us.
translation.zh: -好 谢谢你-感谢您乘坐我们的宇宙飞船

translation.en: We do appreciate it.
[Captain Lu] Please prepare for landing.
[Roy] All the hopes we ever had for space travel...
translation.zh: 我们对太空旅行的所有希望

translation.en: covered up by drink stands and T-shirt vendors.
translation.zh: 已被饮料台和T恤供应商掩盖

translation.en: Just a recreation of what we're running from on Earth.
translation.zh: 只不过重复着我们在地球上回避的东西

translation.en: We are world-eaters.
If my dad could see this now...
translation.zh: 如果我父亲能看见这一切

translation.en: he'd tear it all down.
[Pruitt] Our rocket is named Cepheus.
translation.zh: 我们的火箭被命名为“仙王座”

translation.en: The crew will be SPACECOM military personnel.
translation.zh: 宇航员将是太空司令部的军事人员

translation.en: They're completely unaware of our mission.
translation.zh: 他们对我们的使命一无所知

translation.en: We have to keep it that way.
The launchpad is on the other side of no man's land.
translation.zh: 发射台位于无人区的另一边

translation.en: It's very dangerous...
so we'll have armed personnel to protect us and escort us to the Far Side.
translation.zh: 所以会有武装人员保护并护送我们到远方

translation.en: Colonel, can I ask what the last conversation you had with my dad was?
translation.zh: 上校 是否可与我分享你和我父亲最后一次的谈话内容？

translation.en: It was not very pleasant.
We quarreled about my leaving the program.
translation.zh: 我们为我离开这计划而争吵

translation.en: He accused me of being a traitor.
And if you were to find him...
then what?
Is this very difficult for you, son?
translation.zh: 这任务对你来说不容易吧？

translation.en: This being about your father?
No.
No, my dad's a hero.
SPACECOM's trying to impugn a man who's given his entire life to the program.
translation.zh: 太空司令部试图谴责一个将一生献给了这计划的人

translation.en: I think it's despicable.
Or desperate at best.
[announcer on PA] We are approaching Terminal R, lunar rover hangar.
translation.zh: 我们正接近R航站楼 月球车架

translation.en: We've been having trouble with pirates since September.
translation.zh: 自9月以来 我们一直遭遇强盗袭击

translation.en: Some countries have been giving them safe haven.
translation.zh: 一些国家一直给他们提供避风港

translation.en: They'll take hostages or go for our rovers.
translation.zh: 他们会劫持人质或者去攻击月球车

translation.en: It's like the Wild West out there...
but we'll get you to your spacecraft.
translation.zh: 但我们会送你到你的宇宙飞船

translation.en: This your first time in a war zone?
translation.zh: 这是你第一次进入战区？

translation.en: Three years over the Arctic Circle.
[Levant] All right.
And a heck of a lot of Army-Navy games.
translation.zh: 还参加了很多场陆军 海军球赛

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, I guess there's not much you haven't seen, right?
translation.zh: 看来你都见怪不怪了 对吧？

translation.en: Well, look, it's almost a full moon.
A large stretch of the Far Side's real black, so let's suit up.
translation.zh: 远方的一大部分非常暗我们去预备吧

translation.en: [announcer on PA] Lunar Rovers, Group C, set for departure...
translation.zh: 月球车 C组 准备出发

translation.en: to the Far Side launch complex through gate 12.
translation.zh: 由12号门到达远方发射场

translation.en: Please maintain situational awareness.
[command personnel on radio] Rover 7, confirming settings.
[Levant] Bearing two-niner-oh.
[on radio] Roy?
Yes, Colonel.
[Pruitt] Look at it. The big blue marble.
Never ceases to amaze me.
[Roy] Lieutenant, you clocking this?
[man] Yeah, same here.
I can't ID any national markings. Over.
translation.zh: 我无法识别任何国家标记 完毕

translation.en: -[Roy] Lieutenant... -[man 2] At 7 o'clock...
[Levant] Alpha, what do we got here?
translation.zh: 阿尔法 他们是什么人？

translation.en: Alpha, we have what looks like unidentified rovers approaching our position.
translation.zh: 阿尔法 看来身份不明的月球车在接近我们

translation.en: Possible pirate activity, and I got a couple of VIPs with me.
translation.zh: 有可能是海盗 我这里有几个贵宾

translation.en: [man] Roger, moving to flank you.
Uh, Alpha, we may need some ballistics help up here.
translation.zh: 阿尔法 我们可能需要武装支援

translation.en: Potential hostile situation...
[Roy] Here we go again, fighting over resources.
[man 3] We got two coming up on our rear, 7 o'clock.
translation.zh: 我们的后方 7点钟方向有两个出现

translation.en: [woman 1] Appears to be pirates, possibly looking for valuables.
translation.zh: 似乎是强盗 可能正在寻找贵重物品

translation.en: We'll send ballistic support ASAP.
translation.zh: 我们尽快派出武装支援

translation.en: [Roy] What the hell am I doing here?
[Roy] Shit!
translation.zh: -糟了！-阿尔法 我们需要马上支援！

translation.en: [Levant] Alpha, we need backup ASAP! We're being ambushed!
-[man] Mayday, mayday, mayday! -[Roy] Give me a weapon!
[Levant] Just hold on!
[Roy] LRV-3 down.
LRV-2 down.
[Levant] Alpha, we're gonna go off path to reach the Far Side.
translation.zh: 阿尔法 我们要偏离主径去远方

translation.en: [Roy] I have a puncture!
-[Pruitt] Roy! -I have a puncture.
[Levant] Roy, you all right?
[Roy] I'm okay.
[Levant] Alpha, repeat, we need...
translation.zh: 阿尔法 我重复 我们需要…

translation.en: [Pruitt] Lieutenant! Oh, Lord!
[command personnel] Go, go, go.
Hey, break it up.
[Roy] We are not clear. I repeat, we are not clear.
translation.zh: 我们还没脱离危险我重复 还没脱离危险

translation.en: We have multiple enemy craft in pursuit.
[Pruitt] Roy! They're trying to ram us!
[Roy] Command, Lieutenant is KIA. We've lost our escort.
translation.zh: 指挥部 中尉遇刺 我们失去护航

translation.en: Request immediate support. Over.
translation.zh: 要求马上支援 完毕

translation.en: [Roy on radio] Command, the Lieutenant's body can be recovered...
translation.zh: 指挥中心 中尉的尸体

translation.en: just outside Walther crater.
translation.zh: 可在瓦尔特火山口外找到

translation.en: Sorry for the loss.
Over.
[command personnel] Roger that, Major.
Uh, Colonel Pruitt, we're picking up an irregular heartbeat through your system.
translation.zh: 普鲁特上校 我们在您的装置检测到不规则心跳

translation.en: We suggest you get that checked out immediately.
[Roy] He's supposed to be my security blanket.
I'm fine.
[Roy] Why does he still do it?
Why can't he just let go?
My dad couldn't either.
[Romano] Major, we've been expecting you.
If you have any personal business you need to tend to, I suggest doing it now.
translation.zh: 如果你有私事要处理我建议你马上处理

translation.en: Your rocket will leave momentarily.
translation.zh: 你的火箭马上就要启程

translation.en: [Pruitt] Stand down, Sergeant.
Yes, sir.
Roy, just let me sit down.
-[sighs wearily] -Colonel, what is it?
I'm not going to be able to go with you to Mars.
But there are things you need to know, Roy.
translation.zh: 但有些事你必须知道 罗伊

translation.en: Every minute counts.
[announcer on PA] Cepheus crew, prepare for pre-launch checks.
translation.zh: “仙王座”船员 准备发射前检查

translation.en: SPACECOM communicated with me.
translation.zh: 太空司令部已与我沟通

translation.en: It is classified.
Take it.
It will put you at great risk.
They do not trust you on SPACECOM.
But it is crucial...
Sergeant!
[announcer] Commencing pre-launch checks.
You have to go, Roy. Go.
translation.zh: 你该走了 罗伊 走吧

translation.en: Go!
[Roy] Captain, Major McBride, com check.
translation.zh: 船长 麦克布莱德少校 通讯检查

translation.en: [Tanner on radio] Loud and clear, sir. Welcome aboard the Cepheus.
translation.zh: 非常清楚 长官欢迎乘坐“仙王座”

translation.en: [Roy] I'll be hitching a ride with you if that's all right.
translation.zh: 如果可以 我想搭上一程

translation.en: [Tanner] Yes, we were alerted, sir. On our way to Mars, the very last stop.
translation.zh: 是 我们已收到通知 长官在前往火星的路上 最后一站

translation.en: We had two joining us?
translation.zh: 我们应该有两个乘客的？

translation.en: It'll just be one, I'm afraid.
Well, we still like you, Major... McBride!
translation.zh: 好吧 我们依然喜欢你少校…麦克布莱德！

translation.en: I think we might just have ourselves the son of a legend onboard with us, team.
translation.zh: 看来我们船上有个传奇人物之子 各位

translation.en: Roy, son of Clifford McBride.
translation.zh: 罗伊 克利福德麦克布莱德的儿子

translation.en: Oh, wow!
[Tanner] How 'bout that? Best in the galaxy.
Welcome aboard, sir.
[Roy] They are scientists and technicians...
translation.zh: 他们是科学家和技术人员

translation.en: long haulers.
Captain, could you contact Control, and ask about the condition of a Colonel Pruitt?
translation.zh: 船长 请联络控制中心并询问普鲁特上校的情况？

translation.en: Sure, will do now, sir.
translation.zh: 好 马上问 长官

translation.en: SPACECOM, could we get a status...
translation.zh: 太空司令部 请报告…

translation.en: [Roy] They seem at ease with themselves.
What must that be like?
Major, the Colonel was taken for emergency surgery.
translation.zh: 少校 上校被送去进行紧急手术

translation.en: -Copy. -[Tanner] Check list complete.
[Roy] They're oblivious to my purpose.
translation.zh: 他们浑然不知我的目的

translation.en: [Tanner] Destination, Ersa Research Station, Mars.
translation.zh: 目的地 埃尔扎研究站 火星

translation.en: The last manned outpost in our solar system.
translation.zh: 太阳系里最后一个驻人前哨

translation.en: Duration 19 days, 14 hours and 33 minutes. Over.
translation.zh: 路程为19天14小时33分钟 完毕

translation.en: Dear Saint Christopher, protect me today in all my travels along the road's way.
translation.zh: 亲爱的圣克里斯托弗保佑我今天和所有接下来的路程

translation.en: Give me your warning sign if danger is near.
translation.zh: 如果危险临近 请警示我

translation.en: So that I may stop...
[Tanner] Perfect, cue the minibar.
Command, we're gonna give out the mood stabilizers now.
translation.zh: 指挥部 我们现在要派稳定剂

translation.en: -Our psych evals to follow. -Frank.
translation.zh: 接下来就是心理评估 弗兰克

translation.en: [Tanner] 'Cause Lord knows SPACECOM wouldn't want you...
translation.zh: 因为太空司令部不希望你

translation.en: getting all emotional on us up here, again. [mock crying]
translation.zh: 在这里再次被大家影响情绪

translation.en: [Stanford] Deavers.
Major?
[Tanner] Get me one of those, candy man.
[Stanford] Captain.
Captain, I have a small oxygen leak in my suit. I'm just gonna check my patch.
translation.zh: 船长 我的航空服有少量氧气泄漏我去检查一下补丁

translation.en: [Tanner] Have fun back there. We'll let you know if we spot any ETs.
translation.zh: 玩得开心点看到外星人我们会通知你

translation.en: -[clicks button] -Hello, SPACECOM.
We're out here, Cepheus responding. Smooth sailing.
translation.zh: 这里是“仙王座” 一切顺利

translation.en: [operator on radio] Roger, Cepheus, we have your telemetry.
translation.zh: 收到 “仙王座” 我们有你的遥测

translation.en: [Tanner] Boys and girls, time for some Cidofovir. A schmear a day keeps the hair away.
translation.zh: 各位 是时候来点西多福韦一天脱发一点点 让你和头发说再见

translation.en: [Franklin] Nice, Deavers, nice.
[Stanford] Back me up, I've never touched the stuff.
translation.zh: 帮我作证 我没动过那东西

translation.en: [automated voice on speakers] This is an urgent update for Colonel Pruitt, Thomas F...
translation.zh: 这是给托马斯F普鲁特上校的紧急更新

translation.en: regarding the status of the Lima Project.
SPACECOM believes it has detected a possible SOS signal...
translation.zh: 太空司令部相信检测到求救信号

translation.en: from the crew of the Lima Project.
The message could indicate that Commander H. Clifford McBride...
translation.zh: 这信息可能表示指挥官克利福德麦克布莱德

translation.en: intentionally disabled all external communications.
translation.zh: 故意关闭所有外部通信

translation.en: Under such circumstances...
the Commander may have lost all control.
translation.zh: 指挥官可能已失去一切控制权

translation.en: If this is the case...
and communication cannot be made through his son on Mars...
translation.zh: 也无法通过他儿子在火星进行交流

translation.en: then all other efforts must be undertaken to destroy the Commander...
translation.zh: 那我们必须不惜一切歼灭指挥官

translation.en: and halt the surges.
This message is top secret.
[Roy] What happened to my dad?
translation.zh: 我父亲到底发生什么事？

translation.en: What did he find out there?
Did it break him?
Or was he always broken?
translation.zh: 或一直以来他都是疯子？

translation.en: My father...
the most decorated astronaut in the history of the program.
translation.zh: 该计划历史上最有成就的宇航员

translation.en: U.S. Air Force Academy...
his doctorate at MIT.
translation.zh: 他在麻省理工学院获得博士学位

translation.en: He promised me that one day I could join him in his pursuits...
translation.zh: 他答应我有一天我可以和他一起追逐他的梦想

translation.en: that he'd come back for me.
And I believed him.
First man to Jupiter.
First to Saturn.
And then... nothing.
[Tanner] Commence slow down, booster three.
We're slowing down.
[Tanner] Yes, sir.
Got a mayday from another craft, sir.
translation.zh: 我们收到另一艘宇宙飞船的求救 长官

translation.en: Captain, this is a classified mission, we cannot stop.
translation.zh: 船长 这是一个机密任务我们不能停止

translation.en: Our destination is Mars. Ersa Station.
translation.zh: 我们的目的地是火星埃尔扎站

translation.en: [Tanner] Major, this is a mayday. Stopping is protocol.
translation.zh: 少校 这是求救按照协议 必须停止

translation.en: Any supply craft can answer that call.
The mission is the priority, Captain. Do you not hear what I'm saying?
translation.zh: 任务是优先事项 船长 你明白吗？

translation.en: Major, with respect, as I say, we are obligated to stop.
translation.zh: 少校 我无意冒犯我们有义务停下来

translation.en: As you're merely a passenger, I'm not sure I comprehend your position.
translation.zh: 你只是一个乘客我不确定我理解你的立场

translation.en: 'Course, you are well within your rights to take command of this craft...
translation.zh: 当然 你有权指挥这宇宙飞船

translation.en: but if so, you will have to reveal your objectives.
translation.zh: 但如果是这样 你必须透露你的目的

translation.en: Attend to the mayday.
[Tanner] Command, craft is registered as Norwegian.
translation.zh: 指挥部 宇宙飞船注册为挪威

translation.en: The Vesta IX, orbiting asteroid Toro...
translation.zh: “灶神星九号” 绕着托罗小行星…

translation.en: registered for biomedical research...
-on Comet 17-P, Holmes. -[responder on radio] Copy.
[Tanner] Vesta IX, we're responding to your distress call.
translation.zh: “灶神星九号”我们在回应你的求救

translation.en: Do you read?
The distress call is fairly recent.
translation.zh: 遇险呼叫是最近发出的

translation.en: Maybe they were hit by The Surge.
translation.zh: 也许它们是被电涌击中

translation.en: Command, possible forced entry to the Vesta required.
translation.zh: 指挥 可能需要强行进入“灶神星”

translation.en: Either First Lieutenant Stanford or I will take a little spacewalk...
translation.zh: 斯坦福中尉或我会到太空去

translation.en: and make our way to the craft, over. [responder] Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -前往宇宙飞船 完毕-是 长官

translation.en: [clears throat] Donald, what are you thinking?
translation.zh: 唐纳 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: Wanna go out there?
Uh, yeah. Doesn't matter to me.
[Roy] He's scared.
[Tanner] Yeah, I know, my suit smells like a locker room, too.
translation.zh: 是 我知道 我的宇航服也有味道

translation.en: Oh, hell, I could use a good stretch anyway.
translation.zh: 算了 我也可出去松松筋骨

translation.en: [Roy] Most of us spend our entire lives in hiding.
translation.zh: 我们大多人一生都在躲藏

translation.en: I'll accompany you, Captain.
[Tanner] Very good.
[Stanford on radio] Vesta lists 26 souls onboard.
Craft registered for biomedical and animal research.
translation.zh: 宇宙飞船是注册用于生物医学和动物研究

translation.en: [Tanner] Sorry about that little tiff back there, Major.
translation.zh: 刚才的事很抱歉 少校

translation.en: I'm honored to be out here with ya.
translation.zh: 和你一起在这里是我的荣幸

translation.en: You know, your dad is the reason why a lot of us are doing what we're doing.
translation.zh: 你爸爸是很多人成为宇航员的原因

translation.en: He went farther than anybody.
He was the best of us.
Imagine the things he saw.
Imagine.
Vesta, this is Cepheus responding to your mayday signal.
translation.zh: “灶神星” 这是“仙王座”回应你的求救信号

translation.en: Do you read?
Cepheus, the craft is not responding.
translation.zh: “仙王座” 宇宙飞船没有回应

translation.en: Forced entry required.
I am now initiating mayday entry code.
translation.zh: 我现在正在启动求救入门代码

translation.en: [Roy] Vesta, this is Cepheus responding to your mayday.
translation.zh: “灶神星” 这是“仙王座”回应你的求救信号

translation.en: Do you read?
[Tanner] Major, I'll take Truss 5. Why don't you start with Truss 2?
translation.zh: 少校 我来察看桁架5不然你从桁架2开始？

translation.en: Don't wander off too far, now.
Where is everybody?
[Roy] Vesta, this is Cepheus responding to your mayday. Do you read?
translation.zh: “灶神星” 这是“仙王座”回应你的求救信号 你是否收到？

translation.en: Tanner, McBride, check.
translation.zh: 坦纳 麦克布莱德 请报告

translation.en: Tanner, do you copy?
Tanner, do you copy?
Tanner?
Tanner?
[Stanford on radio] Repeat, calling for Major McBride.
translation.zh: 我重复 呼叫麦克布莱德少校

translation.en: Calling for Captain Tanner.
[Roy] Stay calm. I got you.
Make it back.
Cepheus, Captain was attacked by a research primate.
translation.zh: “仙王座” 船长被实验灵长类动物袭击

translation.en: Emergency medical stand by.
Attempting extraction now.
[SPACECOM personnel on radio] Cepheus, this is SPACECOM.
translation.zh: “仙王座” 这是太空司令部

translation.en: Real sorry about that setback.
translation.zh: 我们为刚发生的事感到遗憾

translation.en: First Lieutenant Stanford is in command of the craft...
translation.zh: 第一中尉斯坦福接管宇宙飞船

translation.en: until Captain Tanner can resume his duties. Over.
translation.zh: 直到坦纳船长可恢复他的职责 完毕

translation.en: [Stanford] SPACECOM, this is First Lieutenant Stanford.
translation.zh: 太空司令部 我是第一中尉斯坦福

translation.en: Captain Tanner is dead.
We take comfort knowing that the Captain embraced the rewards...
translation.zh: 我们很安慰船长接受了奖励…

translation.en: [Franklin] May the angels and the saints come to meet you, as you go forth from this life.
translation.zh: 愿天使和圣徒来迎接你在你离开今生时

translation.en: May you meet your Redeemer face to face, and enjoy the vision of God forever.
translation.zh: 愿你与你的救赎主见面并永远享受上帝的显圣

translation.en: Amen.
[automated voice on speakers] McBride, Roy R. Are you ready for your psychological evaluation?
translation.zh: 麦克布莱德 罗伊R你准备好进行心理评估吗？

translation.en: [Roy] Yes.
[automated voice] Please begin.
[Roy] I am on my way to Mars.
We answered a mayday call, and...
translation.zh: 我们回应了一个求救信号 然后

translation.en: ended in tragedy.
We lost the Captain.
[automated voice] Your answer is being processed. Please continue.
translation.zh: 你的答案正在处理中 请继续

translation.en: Well, that's it. I mean, we...
We go to work, we do our jobs...
translation.zh: 我们去上班 去做事

translation.en: and then it's over.
We're here, and then we're gone.
translation.zh: 我们前一秒在这里 后一秒就消失

translation.en: [automated voice] Please describe how the incident itself affected you.
translation.zh: 请描述事件本身对您的影响

translation.en: The attack...
it was full of rage.
I understand that rage.
I've seen that rage in my father...
translation.zh: 我在我父亲身上见过那种愤怒

translation.en: and I've seen that rage in me.
Because I'm angry...
that he took off.
He left us.
You know...
but when I look at that anger, if I push it aside and just put it away...
translation.zh: 当我正视那愤怒如果我把它放一边 把它拿走

translation.en: all I see is hurt.
I just see pain.
I think it keeps me walled off...
walled off from relationships...
and opening myself up and, you know, really caring for someone.
translation.zh: 或无法让我打开心扉真正关心一个人

translation.en: And I don't know how to get past that.
translation.zh: 而且我不知如何克服这个问题

translation.en: I don't know how to get around that.
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么解决这个问题

translation.en: And it worries me.
And I don't wanna be that guy.
I don't wanna be my dad.
[automated voice] Your psychological evaluation has been approved.
translation.zh: 您的心理评估已获批准

translation.en: If you wish to obtain a complete...
translation.zh: 如果你想获得一个完整的…

translation.en: [Stanford] Major, would you commence auto-landing sequence?
translation.zh: 少校 你能否开始自动着陆程序？

translation.en: [Roy] Copy.
[Stanford] SPACECOM, we're approaching Mars. Ersa Station, south. Over.
translation.zh: 太空司令部 我们正靠近火星埃尔扎站 南部 完毕

translation.en: What the hell was that?
[Deavers] Is that another surge?
[Stanford] I think we just lost primary electrical bus.
translation.zh: 我想我们刚失去主电总线

translation.en: [Roy] Switching to bus Charlie.
Captain, we're coming in too hot.
Our angle's off 20 degrees.
[Stanford] I...
[automated voice] Warning. Incorrect angle of descent.
translation.zh: 警告 下降角度错误

translation.en: [Roy] Go to manual.
translation.zh: 警告 下降角度错误 转成手动

-[Stanford] I think I'm, uh...
-[Roy] Go to manual. -[automated voice] Danger.
-Danger. -Initiating manual override.
Item 3-2...
On my mark, execute.
Mark. I have command of the ship.

translation.en: [automated voice] Danger.
Danger.
[Roy] 2,000 meters.
1,000 meters.
[automated voice] Warning. Incorrect angle of descent.

translation.en: Four...
three...
two...
one.
Contact.
Engine shut down.
Engine saved. Your ship, Captain.
translation.zh: 引擎安全 交给你了 船长

translation.en: Major, would you, uh, start post-landing sequence, please?
translation.zh: 少校 请你开始登陆后程序好吗？

translation.en: Copy that.
Captain, I believe you understand why I did that.
translation.zh: 船长 我相信你明白我那样做的原因

translation.en: I will not report it to SPACECOM.
translation.zh: 我不会向太空司令部报告

translation.en: [personnel on speakers] This is an emergency alert.
We have experienced an external power surge.
However, all underground systems remain fully operational.
translation.zh: 但是 所有地下系统仍可全面运行

translation.en: And there is no reason for panic.
[Roy] My destination.
[personnel] We repeat, all underground systems are fully operational.
translation.zh: 我们重复所有地下系统都已全面运作

translation.en: [Roy] Seven weeks since Earth, since air, since sun.
translation.zh: 离开地球、空气和太阳七个星期

translation.en: [Tanya] Hey, earthlings!
translation.zh: 地球人！欢迎来到埃尔扎研究站

translation.en: Welcome to Ersa Research Station.
translation.zh: 地球人！欢迎来到埃尔扎研究站 -树木和鸟-幸好你安全抵达

translation.en: -[Roy] Trees and birds. -[Tanya] I'm glad you made it.
[Deavers] Thank you. I need your logs please. Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢-我需要你的记录 谢谢

translation.en: [staff] Sir? [Tanya] You got hit by another surge, huh?
translation.zh: -长官？-你又被另一波电涌击中？

translation.en: Thank God we're underground, but the next one could be the big one.
translation.zh: 幸好我们在地下 但下一波可能很强

translation.en: I mean, it has been crazy around here.
[Roy] This was my dad's last known stop.
translation.zh: 这是我父亲失踪前停留的站

translation.en: [Tanya] Everyone's been running around like it's all gonna end tomorrow.
translation.zh: 大家都乱得像明天就是末日

translation.en: Sir, you can step over here.
translation.zh: 长官 你可以过来这里

translation.en: Put your palm down there.
Very good. Thank you.
All right, you guys are good to move to the next concourse.
translation.zh: 好 你们可以到下一个大堂去

translation.en: The Director will meet you.
Thank you.
[Helen] Welcome to the red planet, Major.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到红星球 少校

translation.en: I'm Helen Lantos, Director of Operations here.
translation.zh: 我是海伦兰托斯 这里的运营总监

translation.en: Nice to see a new face for a change.
translation.zh: 可以看到新面孔太好了

translation.en: Follow me.
You should be glad you arrived safely.
translation.zh: 你应该庆幸你平安抵达

translation.en: We had some kind of cosmic storm.
translation.zh: 我们遇到了某种宇宙风暴

translation.en: We lost three astronauts trying to land.
translation.zh: 我们失去了三名试图降落的宇航员

translation.en: No one knows what's causing them.
-Major? -[Roy] Yes?
[Chip] We're glad you made it.
translation.zh: 我们很高兴你成功抵达

translation.en: Thanks, Helen, we can take it from here.
translation.zh: 谢谢 海伦 这里由我们来可以了

translation.en: You're not authorized at this level.
translation.zh: 你未获得此级别的授权

translation.en: Major?
Well, thank you.
[automated voice] Stand by for secure laser transmission.
translation.zh: 利玛计划 H麦克布莱德博士 等待安全激光传输 尝试绝密链接

translation.en: Attempting top secret link.
translation.zh: 等待安全激光传输 尝试绝密链接

translation.en: Range: Neptune.
"This is Major Roy McBride.
"I'm communicating through a secure laser transmission...
translation.zh: 我在火星北美部门埃尔扎基地通信中心

translation.en: "sent from the communications hub "on Ersa Base, North America sector, Mars.
translation.zh: 通过安全激光传输进行通信

translation.en: "I'm attempting to reach Doctor Clifford McBride.
translation.zh: 我试图联系克利福德麦克布莱德博士

translation.en: "This is Doctor McBride's son, Roy.
translation.zh: 我是麦克布莱德博士的儿子 罗伊

translation.en: "Father, if you can hear me...
"I'm attempting to communicate with you.
"SPACECOM wants you to know "that they are aware of the disturbances...
translation.zh: 太空司令部希望你知道他们知晓那些干扰

translation.en: "and that it cannot be your responsibility.
"They would like all information...
translation.zh: 他们希望获得所有信息

translation.en: "about attempts that you are making "to ameliorate the situation.
translation.zh: 关于你努力改善这种状况所做的尝试

translation.en: "They would also like to tell you...
"they're willing to help and provide "for a rescue mission if possible.
translation.zh: 如果可以 他们愿意帮助并提供救援任务

translation.en: "I hope you receive this message. "Over and out."
translation.zh: 我希望你收到这则信息 完毕”

translation.en: [automated voice] Transmission sent. Awaiting response.
[Chip] Roy, we'll try again next cycle.
translation.zh: 罗伊 我们将在下一个周期再试一次

translation.en: [Roy] They're using me.
Goddamn them.
I don't know if I hope to find him...
translation.zh: 我不知道自己是否希望找到他

translation.en: or finally be free of him.
Dad...
Dad, I'd like to see you again.
translation.zh: 爸爸 我希望再次见到你

translation.en: I recall how we used to watch black and white movies together...
translation.zh: 我想起我们以前一起看黑白影片

translation.en: and musicals were your favorite.
I remember you tutoring me in math.
You instilled in me a strong work ethic.
translation.zh: 你给我灌输了强烈的职业道德

translation.en: "Work hard, play later," as you said.
translation.zh: 正如你所说“努力工作 之后再玩”

translation.en: You should know I've chosen a career that you would approve of.
translation.zh: 你应该知道我选择了你会赞成的职业

translation.en: I've dedicated my life to the exploration of space.
translation.zh: 我毕生致力于探索太空

translation.en: And I thank you for that.
So, I hope we can reconnect.
translation.zh: 所以 我希望我们能够重新联系

translation.en: Your loving son, Roy.
translation.zh: 你亲爱的儿子 罗伊

translation.en: [automated voice] Transmission sent, awaiting response.
Thank you so much, Major, for all your help.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你的帮忙 少校

translation.en: We'll be returning you to the Earth in short order. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我们会在不久后送你回地球 谢谢

translation.en: Excuse me. Did you get a response from my father?
translation.zh: 抱歉 是否收到我父亲的回应？

translation.en: Major, your personal connection has made you unsuited...
translation.zh: 少校 你的身份使得你不适合

translation.en: for continued service on this mission.
[Roy] He answered me, didn't he?
Major, we will let you know any details as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 少校 一有消息我们就会尽快让你知道

translation.en: [Chip] Roy.
Your pulse is very fast.
I know!
There's also some issues with your biorhythms.
translation.zh: 你的生物节律也有一些问题

translation.en: Those will need to be addressed before you can safely return to Earth.
translation.zh: 必须检查这些数据之后才能安全送你回到地球

translation.en: Would you please follow that man to take a psychological evaluation?
translation.zh: 请你跟随那个人去进行心理评估好吗？

translation.en: Major.
Captain.
Captain!
[automated voice] McBride, Roy R. Are you ready for your psychological evaluation?
translation.zh: 麦克布莱德 罗伊R你是否已预备好进行心理评估？

translation.en: Yes.
[automated voice] How are you feeling in your current state?
Good, thank you. I will be returning to Earth soon.
translation.zh: 很好 谢谢 我很快就会回到地球

translation.en: I'm content to go home, and...
translation.zh: 我很愿意回家 还有…

translation.en: [automated voice] You have failed your psychological evaluation.
You will be returned to a comfort room until you are deemed...
translation.zh: 请回到舒适房 一直到你…

translation.en: Contact U.S. SPACECOM.
[automated voice] Provide contact and priority code.
translation.zh: 提供联系和优先级代码

translation.en: Request emergency communication with General Stroud.
translation.zh: 请求与斯特劳德将军进行紧急通信

translation.en: Priority code, Zulu-5-5-Bravo-Papa.
[automated voice] Your priority code is no longer valid.
translation.zh: 您的优先级代码不再有效

translation.en: Please contact a representative if this restriction is an error.
translation.zh: 如果此限制是错误的请与一位代表联系

translation.en: You're going back to Earth now?
Can I help you?
I've only been there once.
As a child.
I was born here.
But I remember it so well.
It was... beautiful.
Ma'am, I'd really appreciate my privacy right now.
translation.zh: 女士 现在我希望独处

translation.en: You're here because of the cosmic rays, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你是因为宇宙射线来的 对吧？

translation.en: That's classified.
The craft you came in, the Cepheus...
translation.zh: 你乘坐的宇宙飞船 “仙王座”

translation.en: they want me to requisition it for deep space...
translation.zh: 他们要我征用它到外太空

translation.en: with nuclear munitions onboard. Did you know that?
translation.zh: 船上载有核弹药 你知道吗？

translation.en: It's for a search and destroy mission.
I am responsible for more than 1,100 people here.
On this base.
Now, I need to know.
Are we gonna die?
I don't know what happens now.
translation.zh: 我不知道现在是什么情况

translation.en: I know who you are.
You are Clifford McBride's son.
translation.zh: 你是克利福德麦克布莱德的儿子

translation.en: Yes.
Well, then we're both victims of the Lima Project.
translation.zh: 那么 我们都是利玛计划的受害者

translation.en: My parents left for that expedition.
translation.zh: 我的父母因为那个计划离开

translation.en: You and I share a great loss, Roy.
translation.zh: 你和我都蒙受极大的损失 罗伊

translation.en: Please, just tell me.
The Cepheus leaves in five hours.
[Roy] You were right.
The Surge is coming from the Lima Project.
Ultimate catastrophe is very possible.
SPACECOM has determined that I am unfit to carry on.
translation.zh: 太空司令部已确定我不适合继续参与

translation.en: That's all I know.
I believe your father is alive.
They never told you what happened to him out there, did they?
translation.zh: 他们没告诉过你他在外面发生什么事吧？

translation.en: [automated voice] U.S. Space Command
translation.zh: 美国太空司令部最高机密简报AP4278

translation.en: Top Secret Briefing. Alpha-Papa-4-2-7-8.
translation.zh: 美国太空司令部最高机密简报AP4278 利玛兵变机密简报

translation.en: Communications has received the following mayday call...
translation.zh: 利玛兵变机密简报 通讯部收到以下求救电话

translation.en: from the crew of the Lima Project, under the command of H. Clifford McBride.
translation.zh: 来自H克利福德麦克布莱德指挥的利玛计划队员

translation.en: This is Clifford McBride, reporting from the Lima Project.
translation.zh: 我是克利福德麦克布莱德在利马计划作此汇报

translation.en: I'm disclosing a tragedy.
Here, on the edge of our solar system, some of our people...
translation.zh: 我们正位于太阳系的边缘我们当中一些人

translation.en: have been unable to handle the psychological distress...
translation.zh: 已经无法应付远离家乡的

translation.en: of being so far away from home.
They desired to return to Earth, and I could not permit that.
translation.zh: 他们希望返回地球 但我不允许

translation.en: And I have to report the reality that they mutinied...
translation.zh: 我必须报告他们叛变的事实

translation.en: committed acts of sabotage trying to commandeer my ship.
translation.zh: 并犯下破坏行为 想霸占我的船

translation.en: I was forced to react with equal severity.
translation.zh: 我被迫做出同等程度的反应

translation.en: I disabled one section of our station's life support system...
translation.zh: 我关闭了一部分的生命维持系统

translation.en: and without doubt, I did punish the innocent along with the guilty.
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 我确实在惩罚有罪之人时殃及无辜了

translation.en: We will not turn back. We will venture further into space.
translation.zh: 我们不会回头我们将向太空探险前进

translation.en: We will find alien intelligence.
translation.zh: 我们会找到外星智慧生命

translation.en: I am forever driven on this quest.
translation.zh: 我将以这个任务为使命

translation.en: [Helen] SPACECOM would never allow their image to be shattered...
translation.zh: 太空司令部不会让他们的形象毁灭

translation.en: so they made him a hero to protect themselves.
translation.zh: 所以他们让他成为英雄来自保

translation.en: Your father murdered my parents.
translation.zh: 你父亲谋杀了我的父母

translation.en: That monster threatens us all.
translation.zh: 那个魔鬼威胁了我们所有人

translation.en: And now it's your burden.
Can you get me on that ship?
translation.zh: 你能不能让我搭上那艘船？

translation.en: I can get you to the rocket.
translation.zh: 我可以把你送到火箭那里

translation.en: After that, you're on your own.
translation.zh: 但之后 就靠你自己了

translation.en: I will deal with him.
I will deal with my father.
[Helen] This is a map of an underground lake beneath the launchpad.
translation.zh: 这是发射台下方的地下湖地图

translation.en: You'll be able to access the ship from there.
translation.zh: 从那里你就可以进入宇宙飞船

translation.en: We're approaching.
They're gonna come for you, you know.
I know.
I don't care anymore.
I need to get back now, do what I can.
translation.zh: 现在我必须回去 尽我所能

translation.en: Good luck.
[Roy] I'm being pulled, farther and farther from the sun...
to you.
You're alive.
All this time.
I must accept the fact I never really knew you.
translation.zh: 我必须接受从来没真正了解你的事实

translation.en: Or am I you...
being pulled down the same dark hole?
[personnel on speaker] This is Cepheus Launch Control...
translation.zh: 这是“仙王座”发射控制中心

translation.en: at T-minus 11 minutes, 7 seconds and counting.
Our countdown continuing and still aiming toward a planned lift-off time...
translation.zh: 继续倒数计时目标是已计划的升空时间

translation.en: at 7:51, UTC.
This is Launch Control. Launch is imminent.
translation.zh: 这是发射控制中心 即将发射

translation.en: [personnel] Final checks from the flight azimuth going on at this time...
translation.zh: 此时正进行飞行方位最后检查

translation.en: and we're also synchronizing the clocks to the spacecraft...
translation.zh: 我们也正在将宇宙飞船时钟

translation.en: with the Mission Control Center in Ersa.
translation.zh: 与埃尔扎任务控制中心同步

translation.en: The engines are armed.
Ten, nine...
eight, seven, six...
five, four...
We have commit.
...two, one.
Lift-off. We have lift-off.
[Stanford] There's a breach.
[Deavers] It's the airlock breach.
[Stanford] SPACECOM, this is Cepheus.
translation.zh: 待命出动 太空司令部 这里是“仙王座”我们的气闸被侵入

translation.en: There's been a breach in our airlock.
translation.zh: 太空司令部 这里是“仙王座”我们的气闸被侵入

translation.en: How to proceed? Over.
[personnel] We see that, too. We're checking it out.
translation.zh: 我们也看见了 我们正在检查

translation.en: Stand by.
[Stanford] SPACECOM, we need orders, please. Over.
translation.zh: 授予访问权限 太空司令部 我们需要指示拜托 完毕

translation.en: [Roy] McBride for Captain Stanford...
translation.zh: 麦克布莱德呼叫斯坦福船长…

translation.en: Do you read?
Jesus, it's McBride.
translation.zh: 我的天 是麦克布莱德

translation.en: He's breached the goddamn airlock.
Captain Stanford, this is Major McBride. I am onboard.
translation.zh: 斯坦福船长 我是麦克布莱德少校我在船上

translation.en: I am not a threat. I repeat, I am not a threat.
translation.zh: 我不是威胁 我重复 我不是威胁

translation.en: [Stanford] Major, your presence is jeopardizing the mission. Stay where you are!
translation.zh: 少校 你的存在正危及任务你别动！

translation.en: Do not proceed any further.
-SPACECOM... -[personnel] Stand by.
[Stanford] SPACECOM, what are your orders?
translation.zh: -太空司令部 你的命令是什么？-我们要确定行动方针

translation.en: [personnel] We're determining the course of action here. [Stanford] We're about to switch
translation.zh: 我们即将转向远程推进

translation.en: over to long-range propulsion.
translation.zh: 你是否能消除威胁？ 没有我 你无法到达海王星

translation.en: [personnel] Can you neutralize the threat?
translation.zh: 没有我 你无法到达海王星

translation.en: You'll never make it to Neptune without me.
You need me.
[personnel] Neutralize the Major. By any means necessary, you must neutralize the Major.
translation.zh: 不惜一切 必须消灭少校

translation.en: Copy that.
[Roy] Don't listen to them, Captain.
I will take all accountability.
[Stanford] Major, stay where you are.
Do not proceed any further. Do you read? Over.
translation.zh: 别再前进 你收到吗？完毕

translation.en: [personnel] I say again, neutralize the Major...
-by any means necessary. -Yoshida, I am not a threat.
translation.zh: -不惜一切-吉田 我不是威胁

translation.en: I am not the enemy.
I am on your side.
[Franklin] Major, we have our orders.
Goddamn it! We're staging!
translation.zh: 该死！我们正与火箭脱离！

translation.en: [Stanford] Frank, get out of there! Deavers!
translation.zh: 弗兰克 快离开！迪维！

translation.en: -Get back in your seat! -[Roy] Deavers, please!
translation.zh: -回到你的位子！-迪维 求求你！

translation.en: [Franklin] Son of a bitch!
[automated voice] Air contaminated.
[Roy] Get oxygen!
Yoshida, oxygen!
[automated voice] Ventilator. Ventilator.
Breathe in!
[Roy] What have I done?
Mission, this is Major Roy McBride.
translation.zh: 任务控制中心这是罗伊麦克布莱德少校

translation.en: I boarded the Cepheus against mission directives.
translation.zh: 我违反任务指令登上“仙王座”

translation.en: I did not do so with hostile intent.
But because of my actions, I regret to inform you...
translation.zh: 但由于我的行为 我很遗憾地通知你

translation.en: all crew members are now deceased.
The flight recorder will tell the story.
translation.zh: 飞行记录器已将一切记录下来

translation.en: History will have to decide.
I'm en route to Neptune.
I remain fully committed...
to the completion of the mission...
namely to destroy the Lima Project in its entirety.
I'm switching off all comms.
I'm going dark until final approach to avoid detection.
translation.zh: 抵达前我会切断一切通讯以避免被发现

translation.en: Over and out.
[automated voice] Estimated length of journey...
79 days, four hours, eight minutes.
[Eve on speakers] You seem really preoccupied with your work.
translation.zh: 你似乎真的全身心投入到工作

translation.en: I just feel like I'm on my own all the time.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得我一直都是一个人

translation.en: I don't know what we're doing.
translation.zh: 我不知道我们在干什么

translation.en: You're so distant.
I mean, even when you're here, I don't know where you are.
translation.zh: 就算你在这里 你的心也不在

translation.en: I feel like I'm looking for you all the time...
translation.zh: 我感觉自己一直在找你

translation.en: trying to connect to you, be close to you...
translation.zh: 尝试和你连接 靠近你

translation.en: and it fucking sucks.
You know, I have my own life.
I'm my own person.
And I can't just wait for you.
translation.zh: 而且我也不能一直等你

translation.en: [automated voice] Feeding tube activated.
[Clifford] ...we have excited real and enormous interest...
around the world, and we're grateful for it.
translation.zh: 世上的人非常兴奋及很有兴趣我们也很感激

translation.en: See, we're doing big things up here. Real big.
translation.zh: 我们在这里做着大事 很重要的事

translation.en: Namely, we are about to answer the number one question...
translation.zh: 就是说 我们将回答最重要的问题

translation.en: when do we find all the intelligent life out there?
translation.zh: 我们什么时候会找到高智能生物？

translation.en: And we know we will, according to the Drake Equation.
translation.zh: 我们知道我们会的 根据德雷克方程

translation.en: [Clifford] What you see here is the new starshade, just ready to deploy.
translation.zh: 你在这里看到的是新的星幔随时部署

translation.en: You see it opening up just like a prairie flower in the springtime.
translation.zh: 你看它开放 就像春天的草原花一样

translation.en: But I think you are no longer deserving...
so I guess...
this is goodbye.
Roy?
[Clifford] ...retired from the program leaves me to doubt
not only your judgement, but your character.
translation.zh: 不仅是你的判断 还有你的品格

translation.en: See, we're just out from Mars now. [Eve] He's been to Mars?
[Clifford] Just on our way past Jupiter...
translation.zh: -我们刚经过木星…-你想知道一个秘密吗？

translation.en: [Eve] Do you wanna know a secret?
translation.zh: -我们刚经过木星…-你想知道一个秘密吗？ -最后进入海王星-A 你是可爱的

translation.en: [Clifford] ...eventually onto Neptune. [Eve singing] ♪ A, you're adorable ♪
translation.zh: -最后进入海王星-A 你是可爱的

translation.en: [Clifford] You have traded...
[Eve] ♪ B, you're so beautiful ♪
translation.zh: -B 你是美丽的-你已交换… -C 你是充满魅力的小可爱-…无限的一瞥

translation.en: [Clifford] ...a glimpse of the infinite... [Eve] ♪ C, you're a cutie full of charms ♪
translation.zh: -C 你是充满魅力的小可爱-…无限的一瞥

translation.en: ♪ D, you're delightful and E, you're exciting and ♪
translation.zh: D 你是可爱的 E 你令人欢喜

translation.en: [Clifford] I am free of your moral boundaries. I have total clarity.
translation.zh: 我没有你的道德界限 我完全醒悟了

translation.en: [Eve] ♪ F, you're a feather in my arms ♪
translation.zh: F 你是我怀里的一根羽毛

translation.en: [Roy] I am on my way to Neptune...
[Clifford] Because we will find our brothers and sisters...
translation.zh: 因为我们会找到我们的兄弟姐妹…

translation.en: [Roy] The zero G and the extended duration of the journey is affecting me...
translation.zh: 零重力和延长的旅程影响了我的

translation.en: both physically and mentally.
I am alone.
Something I always believed I preferred.
translation.zh: 我一直认为我更喜欢这样

translation.en: I am alone.
But I confess...
it's wearing on me.
I am alone. I am alone.
Over and out.
I've let so many people down.
[Eve on speakers] Hi, Roy.
I know it's a little bit weird...
that I'm sending you this video,
translation.zh: 就是寄这录影给你却不和你直接对话

translation.en: and not talking to you in person...
translation.zh: 就是寄这录影给你却不和你直接对话 我很自私

translation.en: I'm so selfish. I'm selfish. I'm just so selfish.
I'm just a selfish person.
[Clifford] And I know for certain I am doing God's work.
translation.zh: 现在我肯定我会侍奉神

translation.en: Forgiveness is bullshit. [Clifford] We will find our brothers and sisters...
translation.zh: -要求宽恕是没用的-我们会找到我们的兄弟姐妹

translation.en: Exaltation!
[automated voice] Approaching location determined by McBride, Roy R.
translation.zh: 接近麦克布莱德罗伊R决定的位置

translation.en: Retrieved, Mars secure laser transmission.
translation.zh: 检索 火星安全激光传输

translation.en: -[beeps] -Entering Neptune signal zone.
[Roy] Execute 72 plus 99.
[automated voice] Executed.
Nuclear activation code accessible through system file 52B.
translation.zh: 通过系统文件52B进入核激活码

translation.en: [Roy] Flight recorder, the Lima Project's orbit is degrading.
translation.zh: 飞行记录仪 利马计划的轨道正退化

translation.en: Its position has shifted somewhat from the programmed coordinates.
translation.zh: 它的位置已偏离编程的坐标

translation.en: I will need to take a transport capsule to maneuver around Neptune's rings.
translation.zh: 我需要带一个运输胶囊围绕海王星环

translation.en: The Cepheus will remain in autopilot while I complete the mission.
translation.zh: “仙王座”将保持自动驾驶一直到我完成任务

translation.en: All my life, I was terrified to confront him.
I'm terrified even now.
What do I expect?
In the end, the son suffers the sins of the father.
translation.zh: 最后 儿子遭受了父亲的罪

translation.en: [automated voice] Warning. Power surge. CPU damaged.
translation.zh: 警告 电涌 中央处理器损坏

translation.en: Warning. Power surge.
Lima, Major McBride of the Cepheus.
translation.zh: 利玛 “仙王座”的麦克布莱德少校

translation.en: United States Armed Forces, Space Division.
translation.zh: 美国武装部队 太空部

translation.en: Attempting to contact Dr. Clifford McBride. Over.
translation.zh: 试图联系克利福德麦克布莱德博士完毕

translation.en: Lima, Cepheus. Do you read? Over.
translation.zh: 利玛 “仙王座” 收到吗？完毕

translation.en: [automated voice] Craft damaged. Unable to dock.
translation.zh: 宇宙飞船受损 无法停靠

translation.en: -[Clifford] Roy? -[gasps softly]
Roy, is that you?
I have cataracts, I don't see very well.
translation.zh: 我有白内障 看不太清楚

translation.en: Hi, Dad.
You alone?
Oh, yeah.
Captain always goes down with the ship.
translation.zh: 船长总是和宇宙飞船共生死

translation.en: I've been here quite a while alone.
translation.zh: 我独自一人在这里已久

translation.en: I'm trying to stop this goddamn surge.
What happened?
My last loyal few tried to escape.
translation.zh: 我最后几个忠诚的船员试图逃走

translation.en: And they started all this.
translation.zh: 然后他们挑起了这一切

translation.en: They caused a meltdown out there, Roy.
translation.zh: 他们在外引起了一场灾难 罗伊

translation.en: We fought, and our struggle caused catastrophe.
translation.zh: 我们打斗了而我们的斗争造成了灾难

translation.en: It's why I'm here.
I'm gonna stop it.
Get the two of us back home, maybe.
translation.zh: 让我们两个回家 可能的话

translation.en: Home?
Yep.
This is home.
This is a one-way voyage, my son.
translation.zh: 这是一个单程航行 我的儿子

translation.en: You're talking about Earth?
There was never anything for me there.
I never cared about you, or your mother...
translation.zh: 我从没关心过你 或你妈妈

translation.en: or any of your small ideas.
For 30 years...
I've been breathing this air, eating this food...
translation.zh: 我一直在呼吸着这空气吃着这食物…

translation.en: enduring these hardships...
and I never once thought about home.
I know, Dad.
I knew this would widow your mother...
translation.zh: 我知道这会让你妈妈守寡…

translation.en: and orphan you...
but I found my destiny.
So, I abandoned my son.
translation.zh: 所以 我抛弃我的儿子

translation.en: I still love you, Dad.
translation.zh: 我还是爱你的 爸爸

translation.en: I'm taking you back.
Hmm... I have work to do.
I have infinite work to do.
I must find intelligent life.
translation.zh: 我必须找到高智能生命

translation.en: It's time to go.
We don't have much time.
Come on.
I admire your courage for coming alone, Roy...
translation.zh: 我很佩服你独自前来的勇气 罗伊…

translation.en: traveling all this way...
following me here.
Makes me wonder what we could have accomplished together.
translation.zh: 我想知道我们在一起能成就什么

translation.en: But I guess...
the fates have deprived me of the partner I should have had.
translation.zh: 命运剥夺了我该有的伙伴

translation.en: If we'd had more people like you...
translation.zh: 如果我们有更多像你一样的人

translation.en: we could have pressed on, could've found what we're looking for.
translation.zh: 我们可以继续探索应该找到我们要找的东西

translation.en: My crew examined all the data...
translation.zh: 我的队员检查了所有数据

translation.en: discovered no other life out there.
translation.zh: 发现外面并没有其他生命

translation.en: No other consciousness.
They quit.
Sometimes...
the human will must overcome the impossible.
translation.zh: 人类必须克服不可能的事

translation.en: You and I have to continue on, Roy. Together.
translation.zh: 你和我必须继续 罗伊 一起

translation.en: To find what science claims does not exist.
translation.zh: 找出科学主张不存在的东西

translation.en: You and I, together, Roy.
translation.zh: 你和我 一起 罗伊

translation.en: Because the Lima Project has told us...
translation.zh: 因为利玛计划告诉我们

translation.en: that we're all alone in the knowable universe.
translation.zh: 只有我们存在于这可知的宇宙中

translation.en: I can't fail.
You can't let me fail, Roy.
translation.zh: 你不能让我失败 罗伊

translation.en: Dad...
you haven't.
Now, we know...
we're all we've got.
[automated voice] Armed. T-minus three hours.
translation.zh: 已武装 倒数三小时

translation.en: [grunting] Dad! Stop!
Roy!
Let me go.
Let me go, Roy.
Roy, let me go.
Let me go, Roy.
Dad!
Let me go, Roy.
Unhook me.
Unhook me, son.
[Roy] Why go on?
Why keep trying?
[Clifford] You're gathering my work, I see.
translation.zh: 看来你在收集我的研究

translation.en: [automated voice] Data download initiated.
We're a dying breed, Roy.
translation.zh: 我们是个垂死的族类 罗伊

translation.en: [Roy] He captured strange and distant worlds in greater detail than ever before.
translation.zh: 他收集了奇怪而遥远世界的资料是历史上最详细的

translation.en: They were beautiful, magnificent...
full of awe and wonder.
translation.zh: 令人充满了敬畏和惊奇

translation.en: But beneath their sublime surfaces...
translation.zh: 但在它们崇高的表面之下

translation.en: there was nothing.
No love or hate.
No light or dark.
He could only see what was not there...
and missed what was right in front of him.
translation.zh: 而错过在他眼前的东西

translation.en: Command, this is Major Roy McBride.
translation.zh: 指挥部 这是罗伊麦克布莱德少校

translation.en: I made it to the Lima Project.
I am destroying the structure...
to prevent any further surges from reaching Earth...
translation.zh: 防止更多电涌到达地球

translation.en: using the nuclear munitions onboard.
I will attempt to return using the explosion as my primary propellant.
translation.zh: 我会尝试回来将爆炸作为我的主推进力

translation.en: In the case I do not survive, I've retrieved significant data from the Lima.
translation.zh: 如果我无法幸免我在利玛取得了重要数据

translation.en: And all efforts should be made to retrieve my craft.
translation.zh: 请尽一切努力来找到我的宇宙飞船

translation.en: [automated voice] Trajectory, Earth. 2.714 billion miles.
I am looking forward to the day my solitude ends.
translation.zh: 我期待着我的孤独终结的那一天

translation.en: And I'm home.
[automated voice] Detonation in T-minus 20 seconds.
[man 1] The aboard advisory system.
[man 2] Affirmative, we're ready.
[man 1] USP flight system is operational. Thank you.
translation.zh: 美国太空司令部飞行系统正在运行 谢谢

translation.en: [man 2] K-R-5 on the 4-2.
[man 1] Good copy, flight.
We're ready to go.
[man] Coming in, clean.
translation.zh: 正在进入 一切顺利

translation.en: Copy that. Thanks.
One ready to go. Data is good.
translation.zh: 已预备好 数据正常

translation.en: We have all good. All good.
You're all right, Major.
[Roy] I'm steady, calm.
translation.zh: 我很冷静 情绪稳定

translation.en: I slept well. No bad dreams.
translation.zh: 我睡得好 没有噩梦

translation.en: I am active and engaged.
I'm aware of my surroundings and those in my immediate sphere.
translation.zh: 我知道周围的环境和那些在我眼前的

translation.en: I'm attentive.
I'm focused on the essential...
to the exclusion of all else.
I'm unsure of the future...
but I'm not concerned.
I will rely on those closest to me.
translation.zh: 我将依靠和我最亲密的人

translation.en: And I will share their burdens...
translation.zh: 我也会分担他们的负担

translation.en: as they share mine.
I will live...
and love.
Submit.
